PatchDownTips: You can minimize game client during download
InstallTips: Please do not close the game during installation
NoNetwork: No internet connection. Please check and try again
HotFixNewPatch: A new update {0} is now available. You're using mobile data for download. Do you wish to proceed?
HotFixRestartToCompleteHotFix: Update complete. Please restart the game.
HotFixRestartToRepairFiles: Repair complete. Please restart the game.
HotFixWriteStorageTips: Please allow storage access in Settings > Application and restart the game to save update resources.
HotFixNotEnoughSpace: Insufficient storage space for {0} update resources. Please remove files to free up space and tap on "Continue" to proceed with the download.
HotFixNetworkChange: You've changed your network connection to mobile network. Do you wish to proceed with the download using mobile data?
SplashCautionContent: When exposed to certain visual stimuli or flashing lights, a very small percentage of people (including those with epilepsy and some undiagnosed individuals) may experience seizures, with symptoms such as dizziness, facial discoloration, eye or face twitching, foaming at the mouth, confusion or loss of consciousness, or uncontrollable muscle spasms. If you, your family, or other household members experience similar symptoms, please consult a doctor before playing the game. If you experience any of the above symptoms while playing, immediately stop playing, seek medical attention as soon as possible, and follow your doctor's advice.
SplashHealthyGamingAdvisory:
Say no to games with inappropriate content and piracy.
Keep your personal information private to avoid scams.
Play responsibly to keep your gaming experience safe and fun.
Arrange your time reasonably for a healthy lifestyle

GetRemoteConfigFailed: Failed to apply Remote Configuration. Please check your network connection an restart the game client.
ResolveIndexFileFailed: Failed to analyze patch list. Please restart the game client and try again or contact customer service.
ValidateResourceFailed: Failed to verify file integrity. Please restart the game client and try again or contact customer service.
GetRemotePackageConfigFail: Failed to apply Remote Configuration. Please check your network connection and restart the game client.
NewVersionDetailDownloadGetReward: An update of the game is available.  Please proceed to download. Log in after the update is complete to obtain <color=#c49e55ff>Astrites*300 and Crystal Solvent*2</color>.
FirstDownloadTip: {0} resources will be downloaded for the update. Continue?
MobileDriverOutOfVersion: Your phone driver version is outdated (GL driver version < 378). This may cause game crashes during your play. To ensure a smooth gaming experience, you're recommended to update system version or GL driver.
DownloadContinue: Tap on the blank area to continue
PatchClear: Local patch resources will be cleared and re-downloaded. Do you wish to proceed?
